records.summary: Huge six Cubed Superstructure Seen in El Paso, July 2001.
records.story: Huge Six Cubed Superstructure Seen in El Paso, July 2001. I observed a huge megastructure floating in the sky over the Franklin Mountains in El Paso Texas.  The event lasted for two hours and thirty minutes.   I was patrolling the parking lot of a mall, and I parked vehicle to update my DAR (Daily Activity Report), and noticed that huge cubed shaped superstructure in the sky and in a row of six connected to each other.  This structure did not move, nor had any visible lights.  The sun was at its descent and blazed brightly in the sky.  The light made the structure very faded as the moon appears in the sky.  The first two cubes were ornate and seemed to have depth in the design, the other four cubes behind it seemed to be plain.   I advised my supervisors of my observations.  It was so moving I asked my Director of Security if I should make an incident report.  He said not to.   I went to the Supervisors to show them what I saw, and they were dismissive.  Another co-worker advised me not to take it so seriously.  I was upset that it really did not bother them much.  I went into the mall and asked if I could borrow a camcorder or camera and their response was no.  I invited them outside to see this megastructure and they were very glib.  I then attempted to take polaroids of the structure and the sun white washed the exposure to be useless.  This megastructure remained in view for two and a half hours as the sun set. All edges of the structure were not sharp but rounded.  I wrote on DAR that, "Reported an UFO to Supervisors and Director of Security, asked if Incident Report needed, and they said ," No."  My female co-worker who is now my ex-wife, told me to not make a big deal about it.

records.story: A fireball was traveling horizontally to the left, but before extinguishing a second fireball did the same and flew up into the sky I was going back inside when I noticed a bright object floating slowly across the sky, my first thought was that its a nice big bright falling asteroid but when I completely focused on it I saw that it continued to glide slowly across the sky moving like a feather horizontal to the left I called my 2 friends from inside to come out and look for themselves I then moved closer to my front yard to follow the object with my eyes my 2 friends and my self witnessed the object.  I have 20/20 vision so to me this object looked perfectly round and I saw bright orange and red flames surrounding this perfect circle I kept talking out loud narrating to my friends how this was definitely no ordinary ufo sighting so this is why I say it took at least 4 min.  Unfortunately I didn't want to go inside and get my camera I was enjoying the ufo hands on very selfish like.  So now that time had past the object began to dim out and started to come down it reminded me of a hot air balloon the flames we're extinguishing and the perfect circle kept coming down vertically now at a slow pace after it was almost invisible and still falling down a second fireball appeared in the sky from where the same direction in the sky as when I saw the first one, this second object also reminded me of a hot air ballon motion only this one floated across the sky horizontally to the left but with great speed very quickly it flew to the same location the stopped above when it reached the same location as the fist object as if it was trying to catch up to it but instead of extinguishing it flew itself straight up into the sky perfectly straight up and up and up until puff just like that we couldn't see it or anything else after that.  So what happened to the first one?  Did it land??

records.summary: Two solid white lights in a straight line formation silently moving to the NE across far NE El Paso
records.story: Two solid white lights in a straight line formation silently moving to the NE across far NE El Paso Located in far Northeast El Paso, near Railroad Dr and Farah Dr, while star gazing, two solid white lights appeared overhead out of nowhere and moved in a straight line formation, one behind the other, to the northeast for just a short distance for about 5 minutes and disappeared. It was a clear night with no clouds.  It was a calm, windless night and there was no detectable sound from the lights passing overhead.  There were no associated blinking or colored lights as on an aircraft. The lights were brighter and more focused than stars, and were flying at an altitude far lower than high planes yet higher than any low planes.  The lights moved straight ahead with no side to side movement, and traveled too fast to be a high altitude plane or a satellite, but slower than a low altitude plane. The lights were in a straight line formation too far apart to be just a single plane.  Although no associated shape was detected, it seemed as if the lights were positioned with one at the front and one at the back. What was so startling and attention-getting was that the direction of travel was entirely not in keeping with the normal flight paths of either ELP or Biggs Army Airfield, nor of the high altitude commercial flight paths crossing El Paso.  The witness is a nightly observer of the constellations and the local commercial and Army flight paths across Northeast El Paso.

records.summary: I let my dog outside for her last bathroom bake for the night.  I looked up at the sky as I always do, but this time I notice a flashin
records.story: I let my dog outside for her last bathroom bake for the night.  I looked up at the sky as I always do, but this time I notice a flashing red light in the sky located just west of me.  It was moving really slow going in an horizontal pattern.   I called for my husband to see if he could tell what that was.  When he came out he look at the sky and said it’s a helicopter, but then I notice the flight patter change a little it, I told him are you sure?  He took another look and said I am not sure. We watch these light for what seemed like hours, then it disappeared.  I went to look it up later and all I found was a still photo taken in January of 2016 that shows 3 lights, but this one in March there was only one.

records.summary: Saucer 50 ft. above hovering over us.
records.story: Saucer 50 ft. above hovering over us. It was a summer night in Texas in 1972, I was 11 years old at the time.  I remember very  vividly the local news channel my parents were watching saying there were strange sightings of flashing lights in the sky around town that were unexplained.  It didn’t seem very alarming to my parents at the time so being kids, we were not very concerned, just kind of excited to see them. 	My sister and I went outside to see if we could get a glimpse of any of these so called lights in the sky.  She was 6 at the time so of course she followed me.  We went out to the back yard to see if we could spot any, it was around 5:00 PM, so the sun was still out.  It was about 15 minutes and we didn’t see anything so we decided to sit on the brick fence and watch for a few more minutes, nothing. 	We were just about ready to jump off the fence when we spotted 3 flashing lights in the distance, probably no more than a few miles away.  They were still and were like flashing orbs.  We got excited and jumped off the fence (it was a small brick fence) and were going to go inside to tell my parents when all of a sudden we heard a humming from right above us.  At that point we were in the middle of the back yard.  I looked up and to my amazement, saw a ribbon of round flashing lights not 50 feet above us. It was a disk, sort of like the flying saucer you see in comic strips.  The lights were different colors and they were flashing around in circles.  It must have been no more than a few seconds when I looked at my sister to see if she was seeing the same thing.  She had fallen to the ground, passed out. I was scared and shook her to see if she was OK.  She opened her eyes and I heard a whoosh. I looked up and the saucer and gone.  Both of us were shocked and couldn’t talk. She got u! p to run in the house to tell Mom and Dad.  I stopped  her and said, “Don’t tell Mom and Dad, they won’t believe us.  This is just our secret”.  Surprisingly she did not say anything that night, or even the next few days.  I had dreams about that evening for days, not bad dreams at all, just like it was watching over us. 	Years went past and we didn’t tell a soul about that night.  We have two sisters and a brother and kept this all to ourselves.  She was very young so I thought she just forgot.  I had so many dreams about that night and after all the years went by, I convinced myself it was just a dream. 	Thirty five years passed, it was Thanksgiving and we were talking about when we were kids.  I mentioned a dream I had about seeing a flying saucer when we lived in Texas.  My sister flushed, turned as white as a ghost and said she had the same dream.  She explained her and I were sitting on the back yard fence looking at the skies when she saw flashing lights in the distance.  She remembers running and looking up seeing some kind of saucer with different colored lights at the bottm and passing out after seeing it.  She remembers me waking her up saying, “Don’t tell Mom and Dad, they won’t believe us.” 	Did we both have the same dream?  I don’t think so.  I believe what we saw was real and deep in my heart, I know there are peaceful beings out there watching us.  Maybe knowing our hearts and letting us know we are not alone. ((NUFORC Note:  Witness indicates that the date of the sighting is approximate.  PD))

records.summary: An incomplete report given on behalf of another due to a kidnapping situation
records.story: An incomplete report given on behalf of another due to a kidnapping situation I am submitting this record as a witness to testimonial given to me by a family relation in 2014. At that time, she detailed an est. 1969 UFO sighting in El Paso, TX with her parents (who are now deceased). So, there were at least three witnesses to the craft she described, in detail, by type of material and color. I believed she may have been in recent therapy prior to sharing the information with me. I needed to share the UFO with her husband, and did so in 2014. I did not relay to him any of the details she shared with me.  Now this incident is reported into the OSHA Whistleblower system as it became a background issue in a kidnapping in 2016.  This is an incomplete report and now I am demanding the person who gave me this information be prosecuted, along with her employers, for terrorism. I would like to be contacted by an investigator who can document this case directly with the source of the UFO sighting.

records.summary: 8-12 objects seen from plane, above them at over 34,000'  ((NUFORC Note:  "Starlink" satellites?  PD))
records.story: 8-12 objects seen from plane, above them at over 34,000' While flying at an Altitude of 34,000 feet over the SW US in a westbound direction, witnesses saw a series of about 8-12 lights in a horizontal line about 10-15 degrees above their level attitude.  The lights faded and returned in a shallow V position only to fade again. The experience lasted about 20- 30 seconds for the reporting witness. This sequence of lights caused a lot of chatter on the radio and was confirmed by 4 other aircraft in the area at different altitudes and headings.
